summary: VS Code Connection and Local Command Execution

message.content: why is the ide showing disconnected

content.text: The IDE showing "disconnected" typically means the language server or development server has lost connection. Here are the most common causes and solutions:

input.description: Check if TypeScript language server is running

content.text: Try reloading the window in VS Code (Cmd+Shift+P → "Developer: Reload Window") or restarting the TypeScript server (Cmd+Shift+P → "TypeScript: Restart TS Server").
